sn6.8:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava divaviharagato hoti patisallino.
sn6.8:1.3: Atha kho subrahma ca paccekabrahma suddhavaso ca paccekabrahma yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva paccekam dvarabaham nissaya atthamsu.
sn6.8:1.4: Atha kho suddhavaso paccekabrahma katamodakatissakam bhikkhum arabbha bhagavato santike imam gatham abhasi:
